channel.title: many on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in many on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-07
item.description: Apple developing new ‘Apple Studio Display’ with 7K resolution (2 minute read) Apple is reportedly developing an Apple Studio Display with 7K resolution.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-14
item.description: Coinbase’s bouncing QR code Super Bowl ad was so popular it crashed the app (2 minute read) Coinbase’s Super Bowl ad was so popular its app temporarily crashed.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-01
item.description: What’s a five-letter word for “acquire”? NYT buys Wordle for “low 7 figures” (2 minute read) The New York Times has announced that it will purchase Wordle for a number in the low seven figures.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-19
item.description: Microsoft to acquire Activision Blizzard for $68.7 billion (3 minute read) Microsoft is acquiring Activision Blizzard in a deal valued at $68.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-17
item.description: Nvidia’s AI-powered scaling makes old games look better without a huge performance hit (3 minute read) Nvidia’s latest game-ready driver includes a tool called Deep Learning Dynamic Super Resolution (DLDSR) that can make most games look sharper.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-06
item.description: Google planning Apple-like integration between its products to compete (3 minute read) Google has announced plans to rival Apple’s ecosystem integration at CES 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-17
item.description: Meta’s sci-fi haptic glove prototype lets you feel VR objects using air pockets (6 minute read) Meta has revealed a pair of haptic gloves that lets people feel objects in virtual reality.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-19
item.description: Here’s everything Apple just announced: New AirPods, MacBook Pros, colorful HomePod Minis and more (8 minute read) Apple has announced new MacBook Pro laptops with M1 Pro and M1 Max chips, an HDMI port, an SD card slot, a MagSafe connector, a notch cutout on the top of the screen, and 3 USB-C ports.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-29
item.description: Here’s everything Amazon just announced: A home robot named Astro, a fitness band and more (6 minute read) Amazon just announced a bunch of new gadgets ahead of the busy holiday shopping season.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-06
item.description: Apple Reportedly in Talks With Toyota About Apple Car Production Starting 2024 (2 minute read) Apple is rumored to be visiting several car manufacturers in Asia to mass-produce a branded car by 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-02
item.description: DoorDash isn’t just delivering meals—it’s making them, too (3 minute read) DoorDash is opening a temporary kitchen to make meals for six restaurants in San Jose, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-30
item.description: Facebook’s next hardware launch will be its Ray-Ban ‘smart glasses’ (2 minute read) Facebook’s next product release will be its Ray-Ban smart glasses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-12
item.description: TikTok is reportedly testing a job recruitment tools (1 minute read) TikTok is testing a recruitment tool to help people find jobs and to help companies, recruiters, and brands find candidates.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-15
item.description: Exclusive: Here’s a first look at some more upcoming features in Android 12 (12 minute read) The first Android 12 developer preview was released nearly two months ago.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-14
item.description: Spotify’s Car Thing debuts as a limited release for selected US users (4 minute read) Car Thing is a Spotify-only voice-controlled device for cars.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-11
item.description: Leaked Renders Claim to Show Third-Generation AirPods Design (1 minute read) A set of renders claiming to showcase the design of the next generation of AirPods has been leaked from a supplier.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-22
item.description: Samsung imagines how its first AR glasses might look in these leaked concept videos (2 minute read) Samsung recently showed off a basic set of image-projecting goggles at CES 2020.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-19
item.description: Apple Hiring Engineers to Develop 6G Wireless (3 minute read) Apple recently posted job ads looking for wireless system research engineers for current and next-generation networks.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-20
item.description: Amazon focuses on another use for Alexa as Echo Frames smart glasses are now available (2 minute read) Amazon is moving its Echo Frames smart glasses from invite-only to general availability.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-11
item.description: The 5 biggest announcements from Apple’s ‘One More Thing’ hardware event (4 minute read) Apple announced new versions of the MacBook Air, the 13-inch MacBook Pro, and the Mac mini at its ‘One More Thing’ live stream.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-08
item.description: The Supreme Court hears Oracle v. Google tomorrow—here’s what’s at stake (7 minute read) Oracle v.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-11
item.description: Inside TikTok’s killer algorithm (5 minute read) TikTok has revealed how its algorithm works.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-27
item.description: Elon Musk promises demo of a working Neuralink device on Friday (2 minute read) Neuralink will demonstrate a working device on August 28.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-21
item.description: Uber can now deliver prescriptions in Seattle and Dallas (1 minute read) Uber has partnered with NimbleRx and expanded its Uber Health Business to include medicine delivery in Seattle and Dallas.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-20
item.description: Palantir to relocate headquarters from Silicon Valley to Colorado (2 minute read) Palantir Technologies is relocating its headquarters to Denver, Colorado from Palo Alto, California.
